channel.title: Chapter Messages not appearing
channel.description: This is my first post so .. hi? Anyways, the messages (like the description of Freeman in Black Mesa Inbound and the chapter name at the start of a chapter and the saved... after you save) aren't appearing. I checked the bms_english.txt file and the titles.txt file and both were normal. Does anyone know a fix for this?

item.title: Chapter Messages not appearing
item.dc:creator: Gordon_Tiecollaronde
item.description:
Wait. Does it show up as #BMS_ChapterTitle_ (Chapter Number)? Or just doesn’t show up at all?

Read full topic

Read full topic
